ThingDef.label: Solar Power Suit
ThingDef.description: A powerful power armor stylized to resemble the old Pressurized Power Suits, made with sunsteel.

ThingDef.label: CMC-500 Powered Combat Suit
ThingDef.description: New generation version of CMC-300 power armour, this made with more modern techniques and utilizing solar materials.

ThingDef.label: CMC-605 Light Powered Medical Suit
ThingDef.description: A lighter and more agile version of the CMC-500, the CMC-605, often called as "Solar Valkyries" affectionately by troopers in the Koprulu sector, is a utility version of the armor designed to keep key medical staff safe even in the direct frontlines while they assist injured troops. As such, the armor itself is weaker than their combat counterpart but have several integrated toolkits and systems designed to help medical procedures. However, the armor itself only contributes towards mending of wounds and stabilization of serious injuries, the clumbersomeness of it actually detracts from precision surgeries.

ThingDef.label: Solar Power Suit Helmet
ThingDef.description: An older prototype version of the CMC series of power armor, the PPS was designed to give solid bulky protection and a rudimentary life support sistem in dangerous or low O2 battle situation.

ThingDef.label: CMC-500 Powered Combat Helmet
ThingDef.description: CMC-300 helmet improved with solar technology. This Model has seen plenty of combat, or at least it is designed to give that look.

ThingDef.label: CMC-500 Powered Combat Helmet
ThingDef.description: Improvement over CMC-300, using solar technologies. This Model has it's visor covered with Carbon Fiber optics, no tactical advantage at all, but looks less orange.

ThingDef.label: CMC-605 Light Powered Medical Helmet
ThingDef.description: A solar Helmet with integrated X-ray vision, tool assist and medical analysis systems onboard.
